reviewText: Two awesome movies. In one collection.
Like both movies very much, had never seen the second movie so when I found them both I got them. I am very happy that they were available, the discs play like should with no problems
Everything I get has a glitch

I don't know about the second movie, but 300 is based on a graphic novel/comic.  Both movies are basically blood porn (and the second movie has an interesting sex scene).  There's lots of special effects during the fight scenes -- and use of various film speeds -- and lots of blood flying around.  Some pretty good lines in each movie.  However, I'm not sure I would watch either movie again.  Too over the top in blood and gore for my tastes.
Both of the movies are good
Really good! My child was learning about the Spartans. It showed how powerful they were. Some nudity. Just made my son laugh.
Son loved he box set.  Great Service
